snippet: Secretary General Ban Ki-moon of the United Nations added his voice on Monday to the criticism of Israel over its seizing of nearly 1,000 acres of West Bank land in a Jewish settlement bloc near Bethlehem.
abstract: United Nations Sec Gen Ban Ki-moon adds his voice to criticism of Israel over its seizing of nearly 1,000 acres of West Bank land in Jewish settlement bloc near Bethlehem.
lead_paragraph: Secretary General Ban Ki-moon of the United Nations added his voice on Monday to the criticism of Israel over its seizing of nearly 1,000 acres of West Bank land in a Jewish settlement bloc near Bethlehem.

headline.main: Israel: U.N. Chief Criticizes Seizing of West Bank Land
headline.print_headline: Israel: U.N. Chief Criticizes Seizing of West Bank Land
